home.description: Simple and intuitive yoga flow builder.
home.heroTitle: Design Inspiring Yoga Sequences in Minutes
home.heroSubtitle: Transform your teaching with our intuitive sequence builder designed for yoga instructors and advanced practitioners. Save time, find inspiration, and create balanced flows with ease.
home.valuePropositionTitle: Designed for Yoga Teachers, By Yoga Teachers
home.timeSavingDesc: Create professional sequences in minutes instead of hours. Reclaim your time for practice and teaching.
home.inspirationDesc: Access a vast library of poses and sequences to spark creativity and overcome planning blocks.
home.sequenceDesc: Easily create balanced sequences with proper counter-poses and alignment principles built in.
home.builderDesc: Our visual drag-and-drop sequence builder makes creating professional yoga flows simple and enjoyable.
home.builderFeature1: Intuitive drag-and-drop interface for sequencing asanas
home.builderFeature2: Add breath cues, props, and modifications easily
home.builderFeature3: Built-in alignment guides and counter-pose suggestions
home.builderImageAlt: Screenshot of yoga sequence builder interface
home.testimonialsSubtitle: Hear from instructors who've transformed their teaching practice
home.testimonial1Text: This tool has completely transformed my class preparation. I can now create thoughtful, balanced sequences in a fraction of the time, allowing me to focus more on my students during class.
home.testimonial2Text: As someone teaching 15+ classes per week, finding fresh inspiration was a constant challenge. Now I can quickly create unique sequences that keep my students engaged and challenged.
home.testimonial3Text: As someone who values their own yoga practice, this tool is a must-have for me. It makes creating sequences so much easier and more enjoyable.
home.trustedBy: Trusted by yoga studios and training programs
home.ctaDesc: Join our community of yoga teachers who are saving time, finding inspiration, and creating more impactful classes with our sequence builder.
